content.raw:
We’re currently using `g3s.xlarge` [EC2 instances](https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types) to launch worker images. This information can be found in the [cloudsim repo](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/web-cloudsim/src/default/k8-readme.md#markdown-header-we-are-using-the-following-amis).

There were some discussions of trying other non-gpu EC2 instances for specific cases, but I don’t have enough context to assert this and as of right now all workers run in instances with GPUs.
content.html:
We’re currently using g3s.xlarge EC2 instances to launch worker images. This information can be found in the cloudsim repo.

There were some discussions of trying other non-gpu EC2 instances for specific cases, but I don’t have enough context to assert this and as of right now all workers run in instances with GPUs.
